Enum MessageType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<MessageType>
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Enumerations.MessageType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<MessageType>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum MessageType
extends java.lang.Enum<MessageType>
Enumeration which represents all the message to send during the game.
